learnings: SculptingManager operates on BuildingBlockManager, not on Mesh directly — bridge provides mesh-native face/edge/vertex ops via MeshDragState FSM
Two-pass smoothing is essential to avoid asymmetric drift when vertices read neighbors that were already modified
SDF grid caching with trilinear interpolation avoids O(N*tri_count) per MC cell evaluation during repeated sphere stamps
approximate_mesh_sdf sign via displacement-from-closest-point dotted with face normal is more reliable than centroid heuristic
generate_box creates faces with separate (non-shared) vertices — SDF sign tests should check magnitude rather than sign for robustness
